getAllApps.description: Retrieves all the applications created by the authenticated user.

getTask.description: Retrieves the result of a specific Flipando application task by its task ID.

props.name: task_id
props.description: ID of the task to be retrieved.

runAppGenerator.description: JSON string of key-value pairs for application input variables.

props.name: inputs_data
props.description: JSON string of key-value pairs for application input variables.

props.name: is_new_app_private
props.description: Whether the new app to be created should be private or public.

runApp.description: Triggers the execution of a specific Flipando application by ID, initiating a background job for application completion.

props.name: application_id
props.description: ID of the application to be completed.

props.name: inputs_data
props.description: JSON string of key-value pairs for application input variables.

props.name: file
props.description: File to be uploaded, if the application requires documents. Supports PDF, DOCX, images, and other document formats.

props.name: file_description
props.description: Description of the file being uploaded. Required when uploading a file.
